definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
a small appetizer/a piece of cake; very easy (idiom)
erhua variant of 小菜一碟[xiao3 cai4 yi1 die2]
(dialect) to treat sb according to their social status, relationship with them etc (idiom)/not to treat everyone equally favorably

sentences.english: Plastic plates and cups also make up 0.5 percent of our trash every year (PDF), and those products induce plenty of environmental agita.
sentences.chinese: 每年廢棄的膠杯和膠碟也在垃圾中佔據0。

sentences.english: I wish she stop blabbering her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我希望她停止碟碟不休地談論她男朋友。

sentences.english: I wish she stop blabbering her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我希望她停止碟碟不休地談論她男朋友。

sentences.english: Dish up and garnish with orange slices.
sentences.chinese: 用碟盛起，並以鮮橙片伴碟。

sentences.english: Dish up and garnish with orange slices.
sentences.chinese: 用碟盛起，並以鮮橙片伴碟。

sentences.english: The dirty dishes were all washed and dried.
sentences.chinese: 所有的髒碟盤都洗乾淨了。

sentences.english: She picks up a dishtowel and begins drying the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起洗碟布並開始把盤子擦乾。

sentences.english: Key technology of TDR is Disk-Tube Reverse Osmosis (DTRO) system.
sentences.chinese: 主要產品是碟管式反滲透垃圾滲濾液處理系統。

sentences.english: If dish is very full, put a pan under the dish to catch spills.
sentences.chinese: 如果菜很充分，把碟盤下捕捉漏油。
聚會上的食物碟滿盤盈。

sentences.english: I bought a cup and saucer for myself yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我爲自己買了一隻附有託碟的茶杯。

sentences.english: Rinse lettuce, then shred it. Place on a plate, put chicken on top.
sentences.chinese: 生菜洗淨，切成絲，放在碟中，上面放上雞塊。

sentences.english: In other words this CD player plays CDs.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，這個CD唱機能夠播放CD碟。

sentences.english: Then remove the chicken, chop it into pieces and serve.
sentences.chinese: 然後取出雞隻，切件後上碟，即成。

sentences.english: Pan-fry chicken steaks in 2 tbsp oil until done.
sentences.chinese: 用2湯匙油將雞扒煎至金黃熟透，上碟。

sentences.english: Pour the mixture into a dish, add fillet. Steam for 15 minutes over boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 鯇魚片放入有蛋的碟中，隔熱水蒸15分鐘。
